Hospitality Etiquette

We are delighted to extend a warm welcome to each one of you as you embark on an exciting journey of academic excellence and personal growth here at British University Vietnam, in collaboration with the University of London. Congratulations on choosing to begin your educational adventure with us!

The International Foundation Program is a vital steppingstone that will prepare you for success in your chosen undergraduate program. As you join our vibrant and diverse community, you are taking the first steps towards achieving your academic and career aspirations.

At British University Vietnam, we pride ourselves on providing a world-class education, fostering a supportive and inclusive environment, and nurturing talent. Here, you will find a team of dedicated educators and staff who are committed to helping you excel academically, develop essential life skills, and make lasting connections with your fellow students.
